TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartMovingEventHandler(object sender, WebPartMovingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartMovingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartMovingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartMovingEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartMovingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartMovingEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时或在其自己的区域内或另一个区域，将被移其他服务器控件。The event is raised when a or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone. 当用户拖动控件，或以编程方式移动时，则可以发生此情况。This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move. 事件由引发方法，并提供机会在完成之前取消移动的过程。The event is raised by the method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete. 如果移动已完成，控件已放置在新位置，此事件后跟事件。If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the event. 中指定的方法委托时将会调用引发事件。The method specified in the delegate will be called when a event is raised. 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnWebPartMoving`属性设为``元素，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
